item.title: Shoegaze
item.description: Cocktail A multi-layered cocktail with fruit, spice, and juniper working in tandem to let you experience a Wall of Flavor. 1 ½ oz London Dry Gin* 1 oz Szechuan Peppercorn-infused Byrrh Quinquina 1 oz Strawberry Cordial ½ oz lime juice Add all ingredients to shaker, add ice, shake vigorously until properly chilled. Double-strain into a chilled coupe glass and garnish with a fresh strawberry. *Recommended: Bombay Sapphire Szechuan Peppercorn-infused Byrrh Quinquina ½ cup Szechuan Peppercorns, crushed 750ml bottle Byrrh Quinquina Combine the Szechuan Peppercorns and the Byrrh in a quart-sized Mason jar and infuse for 48 hours, agitating daily.

item.title: Shieldmaiden
item.description: Cocktail An adventurous Nordic-inspired riff on the Gimlet that incorporates the gentle cooling qualities of sage into the harsher tones of caraway and citrus. 1 oz Aquavit* 1 oz London Dry Gin** 1 oz Lemon-Sage Cordial ¼ oz lemon juice Add all ingredients to shaker, add ice, shake vigorously until properly chilled. Double-strain into a chilled coupe glass and garnish with a floating lemon wheel and a sage leaf. *Recommended: Linie, Krogstad **Recommended: Fords, Bombay Dry, Broker’s

item.title: Shadow Puppet
item.description: Cocktail A dark, moody tipple with rich botanical undertones and a hint of menthol on its finish. 1 ½ oz Rye Whiskey* ¾ oz Cardamaro** ½ oz Pedro Ximenez Sherry*** shy ¼ oz Fernet Branca 4 dashes (4 ml) Peychaud’s Bitters Add all ingredients to a mixing glass, add ice, gently stir until properly chilled. Strain into rocks glass over new ice. Garnish with a lemon peel, taking care to express its citrus oil across the surface of the drink.

item.title: From Hell to Breakfast
item.description: A hint of subtle spice lingers just underneath the surface of this rejuvenating and herbaceous sour that offers more with each sip. 1 oz 100-proof Rye Whiskey* ¾ oz Bénédictine D.O.M. ½ oz Luxardo Maraschino ¾ oz lemon juice 6 dashes (6 ml) St. Elizabeth’s Allspice Dram Add all ingredients to shaker, add ice, shake vigorously until properly chilled. Double-strain into a chilled coupe glass and garnish with a lemon peel, taking care to express the citrus oil over the edge and stem of the glass, and across the surface of the drink.

item.title: Farmers Tan
item.description: Cocktail A refreshingly acidic pick-me-up to ease you through the hottest days of Summer. 2 oz Lemongrass-infused Corn Moonshine* 1 oz Watermelon Shrub ¾ oz lemon juice Add all ingredients to shaker, add ice, shake vigorously until properly chilled. Double-strain into a chilled coupe glass and garnish with a floating lime wheel. *Recommended: Belle Isle Moonshine Lemongrass-infused Corn Moonshine 750ml bottle Corn Moonshine 8 stalks of lemongrass Slice the lemongrass into small pieces, then combine with the Moonshine in a quart-sized Mason jar and let infuse for three days, agitating daily.
